ios.debug.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/iNaturalistReactNative.xcworkspace -scheme iNaturalistReactNative -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build

ios.release.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/iNaturalistReactNative.xcworkspace -scheme iNaturalistReactNative -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build
